title: Name a more ineffable duo. You can't. | Good Omens
author: Amazon Prime Video
comment: ❤🖤Loved this series.. they're hilarious  🤣 💯..wish they coulda made another season something else with them together 😁👍🏽

Vertical video is one of the worst things to come out of social media. Seriously.  It's like Facebook, Twitter, TikTok and vertical videos. Total bottom feeder usage. The world was meant to be seein in widescreen.  /pet peeve.
Thank you for feeding me Good Omens once again
description:

About Good Omens: 
The End of the World is coming, which means a fussy Angel and a loose-living Demon who’ve become overly fond of life on Earth are forced to form an unlikely alliance to stop Armageddon. But they have lost the Antichrist, an 11-year-old boy unaware he’s meant to bring upon the end of days, forcing them to embark on an adventure to find him and save the world before it’s too late.
